verses.verse: Those who trust <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> are as Mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> which can't <S%H4131><s%> be moved, but remains <S%H3427><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

As the mountains <S%H2022><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> so Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> surrounds <S%H5439><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> from this time forth and <S%H5704><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>

For the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%> won't <S%H5117><s%> remain over the allotment <S%H5117><s%> of the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> so <S%H4616><s%> that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> won't <S%H7971><s%> use their hands <S%H3027><s%> to do evil. <S%H5766><s%>
Do good, <S%H2895><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to those who are good, <S%H2896><s%> to those who are upright <S%H3477><s%> in their hearts. <S%H3826><s%>

But as for those who turn aside <S%H5186><s%> to their crooked ways, <S%H6128><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will lead them away <S%H3212><s%> with the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity. <S%H205><s%> Peace <S%H7965><s%> be on Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
